word:
Will you, elders, deacons, all officers of every church,--yes, and every brother and sister,--will you join this blessed movement, and Lift Hard in this effort to create an epoch in the history of our work? 
                          Mrs. E. G. White, 
                          J. O. Corliss, 
                          W. C. White, 
                          E. R. Palmer, 
                                Committee. 
                                                                           3
